text.title: Tony Blair resigns as envoy of Quartet to Middle East
text.head: Tony Blair resigns as envoy of Quartet to Middle East
Sources

list.item: Reuters. "Tony Blair to step down as Middle East envoy" — Al-Jazeera , May 28, 2015
Adam Withnall. "Tony Blair resigns from post as Middle East envoy after eight years with The Quartet" — The Independent , May 27, 2015
"Tony Blair Stepping Aside as Special Envoy on Israel and Palestinians" — NBC News , May 27, 2015
